extendedInfo.description: If you are Snoop Dogg's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Snoop Dogg's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Snoop Dogg's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Snoop Dogg's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Doggystyle- Tha Doggfather- Da Game Is to Be Sold, Not to Be Told- No Limit Top Dogg- Tha Last Meal- Duces 'n Trayz: The Old Fashioned Way- Paid tha Cost to Be da Boss- R&G (Rhythm & Gangsta): The Masterpiece- Tha Blue Carpet Treatment- Ego Trippin'- Malice n Wonderland- More Malice- Doggumentary- Reincarnated************************List of lyrics ************************- (Intro) I Love To Give You Light- (O.J.)
